name: workstash
description: Git Stash Management & Gist Notes for VS Code

mystash.autoRefresh.description: Automatically refresh the stash list when git changes are detected or the window regains focus.

mystash.confirmOnDrop.description: Show a confirmation dialog before dropping a stash.

mystash.confirmOnClear.description: Show a confirmation dialog before clearing all stashes.

mystash.showFileStatus.description: Show M/A/D status indicators on file items in the stash tree.

mystash.defaultIncludeUntracked.description: Default to including untracked files when creating a stash.

enumDescriptions: Show newest stashes first (default git order)
mystash.sortOrder.description: Sort order for the stash list.

mystash.showBranchInDescription.description: Show the branch name in the stash item description.

workstash.notes.autosaveDelay.description: Autosave delay in seconds for note editing. Set to 0 to disable autosave.

enumDescriptions: New notes are created as secret Gists (default)
New notes are created as public Gists
workstash.notes.defaultVisibility.description: Default visibility for newly created notes.

workstash.mattermost.serverUrl.description: Mattermost server URL (e.g. https://mattermost.example.com). Required for Mattermost integration.

workstash.ai.includeSecretGists.description: Include secret Gist note content when gathering AI context for summaries, chat, and agent analysis. When disabled, only public notes are shared with the language model.

workstash.ai.includePrivateMessages.description: Include direct messages and group messages from Mattermost when gathering AI context. When disabled, only public and private channel posts are shared with the language model.

workstash.ai.geminiApiKey.description: Google Gemini API key for AI features (summaries, chat, agent). Required when GitHub Copilot is not available (e.g. in Cursor, Windsurf, or Antigravity). Get a free key at https://aistudio.google.com/apikey

enumDescriptions: Gemini 2.0 Flash — previous generation fast model
Gemini 2.0 Flash Lite — fastest, most lightweight
workstash.ai.geminiModel.description: Default Gemini model to use when the Gemini provider is active.

workstash.ai.modelOverride.summary.description: Override model for AI summaries. Leave empty to use the provider default.

workstash.ai.modelOverride.chat.description: Override model for AI chat. Leave empty to use the provider default.

workstash.ai.modelOverride.agent.description: Override model for AI agent analysis. Leave empty to use the provider default.

viewsWelcome.contents:
Not a git repository.
Initialize a repository to start using stashes.
[Initialize Repository](command:git.init)

No stashes yet.
Stash your changes to save them for later.
[Create Stash](command:mystash.stash)

Sign in to GitHub to sync your notes as Gists.
[Sign In to GitHub](command:workstash.notes.signIn)

No notes yet.
Create a note to get started.
[Create Note](command:workstash.notes.create)

Sign in to GitHub to see your pull requests.
[Sign In to GitHub](command:workstash.prs.signIn)

Not a GitHub repository.
Pull requests require a GitHub remote.

Sign in to GitHub to see issues.
[Sign In to GitHub](command:workstash.issues.signIn)

Not a GitHub repository.
Issues require a GitHub remote.

Sign in to GitHub to see projects.
[Sign In to GitHub](command:workstash.projects.signIn)

Not a GitHub repository.
Projects require a GitHub remote.

No Mattermost server configured.
Set the server URL in settings to get started.
[Configure Server](command:workstash.mattermost.configure)

Sign in to Mattermost to view your channels.
[Sign In](command:workstash.mattermost.signIn)

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && npm run build:webview && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && vite build --mode production --config webview-ui/vite.config.ts && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
